hindi_meaning: xUsarA-anwa-jaya-uxyawoM_se / uxyawa- uTAyA huA, UzcA kiyA huA, wEyAra, lagA huA, jaya uxyawa, vaXa uxyawa Axi

sahya-lagna / sahya- BArawa kI sAwa praXAna parvawaSreNiyoM meM eka, samuxra se kuCa xUrI para paScimI GAta kA kuCa BAga, sahyAxriSreNI, rAmAswrowsAriwoZpyAsIwsahyalagna ivArNavaH(raGu* 4.53)52(ki* 18.5)/ BArawa kI sAwa praXAna parvawaSreNiyoM meM eka, samuxra se kuCa xUrI  para paScimI GAta kA kuCa BAga, sahyAxriSreNI, rAmAswrowsAriwoZpyAsIwsahyalagna ivArNavaH(raGu* 4.53)52(ki* 18.5)/ lagna / sparSa karanA, saMparka meM AnA, anuRakwa, saMbaxXa
